price: Ni ukuri, Twaranoroheje Qor’ani, mu kuntu isomwa, ukuntu ifatwa ku mutwe, hamwe rero n’ugutahurika kwayo ikanazigamwa, ku wushaka kwibuka akikebuka. Mbega none, hoba hari uwibuka ngo yikebuke[2]!
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
footnotes: [2] Iyi Aayah n’izindi zisusa na yo mu nsiguro, zihimiriza abantu kwiga, kwigisha no gusoma kenshi Qor’ani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
